PowerTCP Sockets for .NET

Thank you for your interest in PowerTCP Sockets for .NET! If you have any questions, please contact us at support@dart.com.

Licensing

A licenses.licx with an entry for a PowerTCP Sockets for .NET class must be present in your project.

1. If your project does not already contain a licenses.licx, add a new text file named "licenses.licx" to the project (not the solution) from the Solution Explorer.

2. Add a single line to the licenses.licx that includes the fully-specified class name and the assembly name, separated by a comma. If your project targets .NET 4.5+, add:

 Dart.Sockets.Tcp, Dart.Sockets.45

If your project targets .NET 4.0 or below, add:

 Dart.Snockets.Tcp, Dart.Sockets

Additional Resources

Online API help documentation, sample applications, and brief code examples are available here.
